column5: Hello all, I am wondering if anyone has been to Bauer's on Onaman lake. I have seen many have fished Onaman lake but I have not seen any posts for the outfitter Bauer's. Any information would be appreciated as I am considering going there next year.
Never stayed there but fished along side of the island with the cabins. It looks like a nice place from the water. Decent boats. I am pretty sure there are camp managers that keep the place up.
